title: Poppy Seed Swirl Bread
ingredients: ['700g plain flour', '2 (7g) sachets dried active baking yeast', '350ml milk', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '75g margarine', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 eggs', '250ml boiling water', '100g poppy seeds', '60g walnuts, chopped', '5 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '1 egg white']
